html:
8.15.20  12:51 pm   I am self learning piano (a keyboard to be more precise). The only thing I think will trouble me is wrong posture. How do I avoid getting injured and what's the right posture?

      i'm just guessing..... make sure your forearm is parallel to the ground. and be comfortable, and stand up from time to time

8.15.20  12:25 pm   In 'might quit' you wear a towel on your head during some segments.  What was the inspiration for the towel,

     was trying to stay dry. the contents of the song was getting too wet

     and why that one, as opposed to the other one?

     would have used whichever one was dryer

     How many towels do you consider a part of your standard repertoire,

     2

      and which towel do you feel, in your own opinion, to be incontestably the best among them?  

     if i thought 1 was the best i wouldn't have 2

     And, lastly, what color is green?

      that's the color of the first towel

8.15.20  11:52 am   whats freedom

      i'm hoping to change it

8.15.20  11:13 am   is the earth flat?

      no but maybe you could flatten it

8.15.20  10:12 am   what's your favourite kind of pizza?

      actual

8.15.20  9:39 am   How many panicked rushes of extreme productivity from "ohmygodimwastingmylife I havent written 1/1000 of the songs I want to" until productivity is just on demand. Schedules just suck I'd say dump em' but here I am failing again so I guess maybe not??

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

8.15.20  8:51 am   Would you ever ever consider ending a song with a fade out?

     sure, i've done that in at least 2 songs

      If not, why not?

     it's usually more fun to end it for real. in many cases i've written the ending as a fade but then when actually performing it, an ending happens (inevitably the musicians (me) in real life have to stop playing sometime, ..... so if their real ending is cool then why not)

8.15.20  7:02 am   Do you ever think 

      that sounds like something i would do

8.15.20  6:38 am   What are some of your influences 

      hills,

8.15.20  5:14 am   Can you draw?

      yes

8.15.20  5:04 am   why is everything dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

8.15.20  4:51 am   will you barf on me?

      maybe some other time

8.15.20  4:50 am   This page might be a machine learning program that answers all the questions so I must test you for this. Please share your opinion about the next sentence. This sentence is false.

      in what world would that possibly be a good test. i've already done that one anyway at least 4 times, so even a computer from 1975 could have gotten that

8.15.20  4:48 am   Can I ask a meaningless question

      i dare you to try

8.15.20  4:24 am   How can I win a debate?

      destroy the entire universe

8.15.20  4:21 am   I want to write music but I'm a drummer and things like learning theory and all the chords and keys and stuff had never really clicked with me. Every time a try to write a song I get discouraged cause I don't really understand how to make everything fit together the way I want it to. What should I do bill?

      spend more time at the piano (or guitar, or whichever instrument you prefer). it's kind of like being in a building for a while, eventually you learn your way around

8.15.20  3:44 am   thoughts on the universe?

      never heard of it

8.15.20  3:10 am   Is your house secretly a giant chicken?

      i either don't know or can't tell you

8.15.20  2:31 am   What is sand made of?

      grains of sand

8.15.20  2:13 am   Are turtles good businessmen

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.15.20  1:46 am   What's the best type of table?

      TIME

8.15.20  1:27 am   How do you balance all of your vocals/harmonies to make such a smooth calming effect?

      make them mostly all the same volume, and quieter than the lead, BUT that's not what makes the calming effect. the note choices, vocal performance, and wider melodic AND lyrical context must all conspire together for this

8.15.20  12:47 am   what does music taste like?

      like water with very interesting colors flowing through it

8.15.20  12:42 am   whats a pineapple?

      i couldn't even begin to imagine

8.15.20  12:02 am   You answer almost all of these indirectly, unseriously, or both.

     or directly, or seriously. or all 4

      Is this for comedic purposes, or because you're just really sick of people's questions?

     i answer in as many ways as i can, due to the high quantity of questions. still not as many ways as there are questions, but i try

8.14.20  11:53 pm   What is your opinion on Swiss cheese

      don't like it, but the good news is it has holes, so there is an opportunity to put other types of cheese in those holes

8.14.20  11:46 pm   do you think that explaining the meaning of a song its bad because that way you kill the others interpretation
of it?

      other way around. their interpretation might kill a previous explanation

8.14.20  11:43 pm   can people become better after being terrible?

      yes

8.14.20  10:52 pm   who is the president?

      i've been meaning to check

8.14.20  10:49 pm   CAP ALERT! https://i.imgur.com/oKVAAUe.png

      oh dear

8.14.20  10:43 pm   i just saw you use capitals in an answer. i'm scared are you really bill or an imposter send help.

     the imposter must be you. i use capitals all the time, you would readily know this if you had spent more than 2 minutes here. or watched any of my videos. hope that helps

8.14.20  10:01 pm   If the handwritten bits in your videos are your actual handwriting, then you have identical handwriting to my dad. Why did you steal my dad's handwriting?

     why did he steal mine

     If it's not your handwriting, I'm sorry for the accusation.

8.14.20  9:38 pm   did you do a bad thing

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

8.14.20  9:34 pm   how does one be so creative?

      first, disassemble the entire observable universe into its component particles, then re-assemble it to taste

8.14.20  9:27 pm   what were u doing on dec 2 2016

      this, this, this, etc

8.14.20  9:25 pm   what was your favourite videdo to make

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.14.20  9:18 pm   why is the earth a planet?

      someone's gotta do it

8.14.20  9:04 pm   Okay, so we know you're good at everything about music: singing, playing a bunch of instruments, composing etc. You're also good at visual effects and now you're studying animation. So, on top of all of that, what other forms of art have you tried?

     trying to figure out what the flipping heckfuck is going on in the world

     Writing? Drawing?

     those have already been involved heavily in my video making

     What is your opinion on creating stuff in general?

     sometimes it can allow you to catch a tiny glimpse of what the flipping heckfuck is going on in the world

8.14.20  8:57 pm   So like if I want to become a good violinist I practice scales every day. If I want to become good at sketching/painting I practice drawing lines and circles and human anatomy and stuff. These are exercises I do to learn/refine a technique in isolation of the actual music/art-making. Are there analogous drills for music composition and can you recommend any good ones?

      start with a blank piece of paper and use it to try to figure out what the flipping heckfuck is going on in the world

8.14.20  8:32 pm   are you in school

      absolutely not

8.14.20  8:16 pm   I noticed a lot of your songs are about running away, should I take your advice and quit school and run away?

      that wasn't my advice

8.14.20  7:32 pm   Any idea how I'm supposed to get myself to do things I want to but am to lazy to do?

      explain to me exactly how you would do it

8.14.20  7:27 pm   What is a good idea?

      ice, but it's burnt

8.14.20  7:09 pm   I'm trying to figure out what to do with my life. Any advice?

      invent the world. i know you're gonna say it's already been invented, but i promise that's not true

8.14.20  7:04 pm   Is the "big project" your working on something similar to that of Entire history series or is something completely different

      that's not a series, but what makes you think i'm working on a big project

8.14.20  6:55 pm   What does the song, "it's the first day of school (and i think i might quit)" mean?

      you'll have to listen to it and see

8.14.20  6:48 pm   how to forget the past

      make the future

8.14.20  6:08 pm   Will The Bill Wurtz Band be going on tour?

      yes

8.14.20  6:04 pm   If a machine would be able to play any music, what would it play?

      all of it

8.14.20  5:44 pm   You're awesome!! Do you have any projects that you really want to make but just haven't yet?

      yes, dam near trillions
